00022 struct HighlightStyleDesc
00023 {
00024     QColor color;       
00025     bool bold;          
00026     bool italic;        
00027 
00031     HighlightStyleDesc() : color(Qt::black), bold(false), italic(false)
00032     {
00033     }
00034 
00038     HighlightStyleDesc(QColor color, bool bold, bool italic) : color(color), bold(bold), italic(italic)
00039     {
00040     }
00041 };
00042 
00043 inline QDataStream& operator<<(QDataStream& out, HighlightStyleDesc const& obj)
00044 {
00045     out << obj.color << obj.bold << obj.italic;
00046     return out;
00047 }
00048 
00049 inline QDataStream& operator>>(QDataStream& in, HighlightStyleDesc& obj)
00050 {
00051     in >> obj.color >> obj.bold >> obj.italic;
00052     return in;
00053 }
